metadata.title: CVE-2024-49897 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Check phantom_stream before it is useddcn32_enable_phantom_stream can return null, so returned valuemust be checked before used.This fixes 1 NULL_RETURNS issue reported by Coverity.

criterions.comment: linux package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp package in oracular is affected and may need fixing.
